claim: The Olympic Games includes both a summer and winter games, each every 4 years.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Commonwealth Winter Games , which happen every 4 in 4 years just like they do in a normal Commonwealth Games but happens two years after the summer , do not usually have a central Olympic Stadium , but instead have edifices that are designated as the Olympic Stadium to host the opening and closing ceremonies .

claim: The Olympic Games includes both a summer and winter games, each every 4 years.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Olympic Games are held every four years , with the Summer and Winter Games alternating by occurring every four years but two years apart .

claim: The Olympic Games includes both a summer and winter games, each every 4 years.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Until 1992 , the Winter and Summer Olympic Games were held in the same years , but in accordance with a 1986 decision by the International Olympic Committee  (  IOC  )  to place the Summer and Winter Games on separate four-year cycles in alternating even-numbered years , the next Winter Olympics after 1992 was in 1994 .

claim: The Olympic Games includes both a summer and winter games, each every 4 years.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Winter Olympic Games  (  Jeux olympiques d'hiver  )  is a major international sporting event that occurs once every four years .

claim: The Olympic Games includes both a summer and winter games, each every 4 years.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The United States has won gold at every games at which it has competed , more gold and overall medals than any other country in the Summer Games and also has the second-most gold and overall medals at the Winter Games , trailing only Norway .
